segments.text: I feel like going for a drink , it's been a long day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great idea ! Peter , I could use the drink .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about the new bar across road ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . The food there is fantastic too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree , I had lunch there last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excellent ! That sounds like a plan .
segments.speaker: S2
